boardgame.name: Decktet
Deco Decktet
Double Decktet
Дектет
boardgame.description: The Decktet is a 45-card deck of cards in 6 suits._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The core of the Decktet is the 36-card basic deck. Each suit has 10 cards, a thing accomplished by most of the cards being double-suited. Most of the cards also have a name and illustration. The Decktet is a game system released under an open license._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are also 9 extended deck cards. Like Jokers in a traditional deck of cards, they are used in some games but not in others._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Decktet is available in a free print-and-play version. There are also printed decks available for purchase._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are dozens of different games that can be played with the Decktet, many of which have their own entries in the database:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; the Decktet game family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Decktet games, ordered by rating_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This is the complete extended Decktet, printed on 12pt Carolina cover stock. It does not come with a box or other paraphernalia.
This is the complete extended Decktet, printed on 12pt Carolina cover stock. It does not come with a box or other paraphernalia.
Professionally printed on covers stock with full color faces and card backs.
Professionally printed on cover stock, with full colour faces and card backs
Unplayed - cards printed on good stock professionally. Collect from London. £4 shipping to UK, Enquire for EU.

This entry is not a Decktet deck but rather a stack of counters usable for Decktet games. The counters come in 10 colors, you may choose which you want to correspond to the suits and have extras left over for other things (some games require specific player colors). There are 10 counters in each of the 10 colors for a total of 100 counters. These counters are my preferred choice for Magnate especially. Buyer to pay exact shipping and handling costs, per their preffered method.
stacking counters for user nooa42, paid and delivered

I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know if this happened to anyone else but I got excited about the idea of making my own games when I saw the Decktet. I then realized after getting the cards and the suite chips that this was something that I couldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get in to. The Decktet is awesome and the suite chips I got are great too. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s just heard to talk my group of casual gamers to get excited about something that looks so complicated. I just can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t see this sitting on a shelf and I want it to go to a good home. Buyer will pay shipping, my zip is 15202. This is a small and light game so shipping will not cost that much.
For Leslie Barkley (danceaddict) Only! Won in the 25 Games - 1 Week Auction.

Played only a few times. Still like new. This is the complete Decktet. It includes the 36-card basic deck: single-suited Aces, double-suited ranks 2 through 9, and single-suited Crowns. It also includes all the extended deck cards: the Excuse, the triple-suited Pawns, and the Courts. This deck has the firmament card back. Rules for Thricewise and Nonesuch are included. Also includes a soft-plastic see-through case to hold cards. Cost: $5 Shipping: $5 If you order this with at least one other game I have for sale (Buzzword, Decktet, GiftTrap, Granny Wars, Little Devils, Lost Valley: Yukon Goldrush, PicWits!, Pit, Roll to the South Pole, Uno Flash, Wurfel Ligretto), I will lower the cost of all games and combine shipping.

Selling off this print-and-play Double Decktet set - Double Decktet (ie two decks) printed on high quality 310gsm linen card stock using makeplayingcards.com - _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Filigree_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; back (as pictured) - Comes with 12 matching wooden disks per suit (for playing games like Magnate) - Sleeved and stored in a sturdy, plain white card box
